1.title: Why Me?
1.description: Matt, a sleep-deprived computer science senior, is trapped into a broken virtual reality world he created years ago and must debug it to escape, facing off against his own chaotic code and a monstrous Clippy-like boss.

2.title: A Million To One
2.description: As our story unfolds, it becomes clear that there is hell, and then there is hell on earth. And worst of all...there are some demons you never see coming.

3.title: Beyond the Ocean Door
3.description: An epic fantasy adventure that takes you on a journey through a world filled with magic, danger, and unexpected twists.
